solution_line_template: He needs to remove {flour_to_remove} cups of flour because {total_flour_in_bag} minus {flour_needed} equals <<{total_flour_in_bag}-{flour_needed}={flour_to_remove}>>{flour_to_remove}.
He needs to use {num_scoops} scoops because {flour_to_remove} divided by {measuring_cup_size} equals <<{num_scoops}={num_scoops}>>{num_scoops}
